product_name: GODDESS GARDEN Kids' Sport Natural Sunscreen SPF 30 - 3.4 fl. oz.
long_description: Great for all kinds of outdoor activities, this organic sunscreen provides full-spectrum UVA and UVB sun protection for your child's skin and is water-resistant for 40 minutes.
short_description: Great for all kinds of outdoor activities, this organic sunscreen provides full-spectrum UVA and UVB sun protection for your child's skin and is water-resistant for 40 minutes.
